profileAlternative.name: Nate Leslie
profileAlternative.headline: Recruiter at MongoDB, Inc.
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a recruiting professional with a passion for inspiring the people around me to reach their own potential. I am a creative thinker who craves opportunities to grow and challenge my own comfortability.

"There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow men. True nobility lies in being superior to your former self." -Ernest Hemingway

Specialties: Full-Cycle Recruiting—Passive Candidate Sourcing—Cold Calling—Value Selling—Internal Communication—Professional development—ATS Management (Greenhouse, Jobvite, Newton, Kronos)—SaaS Sales—Event logistics—Strategic planning—Marketing—Curriculum development—Project management—Public speaking—Customer Service—Employee Engagement

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

MongoDB is the next-generation database that helps businesses transform their industries by harnessing the power of data. The world’s most sophisticated organizations, from cutting-edge startups to the largest companies, use MongoDB to create applications never before possible at a fraction of the cost of legacy databases. MongoDB is the fastest-growing database ecosystem, with over 9 million downloads, thousands of customers, and over 1,000 technology and service partners. Learn more at www.mongodb.com.

Feel free to email directly at nate.leslie@mongodb.com.

positions.title: Recruiter
positions.description:
Hiring Focus: Professional Services

I am currently recruiting Professional Services experts with technical depth and strong customer presentation skills. If you are customer-focused and have a passion for unleashing the power of software and data for developers, please reach out to me at nate.leslie@mongodb.com to learn more.

To view all Professional Services roles, https://www.mongodb.com/careers/departments/professional-services

All open roles at MongoDB can be found at https://www.mongodb.com/careers/

Attainment:
FY20
-Q1 - 100%
-Q2 - 113%
--
FY19 - 116%
FY18 - 114% *'One Team' Award Winner*
FY17 - 113%

Hiring Focus: Sales & G/A.
Sales MVP Q2 2014

given.text:
Simply put, Nate is a Rockstar! He understood the market, built strong relationships with the candidates we had connected him to, and went above and beyond to secure the talent in such a hyper competitive space. His approach to candidate care and his interviewing techniques was what really set him apart from the crowd. He's genuinely passionate about what he does, making him a true master of his craft and an asset to any team.
…
See more

Nate is an extremely hard working employee that will not only exceed your expectations with any task given to him, but he also has the ability to improve the morale of any team on which he is working. Through his good natured approach he was able to encourage all those around him to work even harder, and produce higher quality work than they ever had before. I would recommend him for any position with any company.
…
See more

Nate was one of the first people I met when I was first hired at Sensory Sweep, and he quickly made it a point to make sure I felt welcome and part of the team. Nate would often stay long hours to help work on a project, and was always willing to help whenever it was needed. Truly, Nate is a great worker, a great employee, and a great guy.
…
See more

received.text:
It’s rare to find someone as passionate about people as Heather. Watching her partner with New Relic's leaders to build out their Enterprise and SMB Sales teams was a real joy. She is a true advocate for the company and her candidates, which is a difficult balance to find, but one she navigates seamlessly.

There are few individual people in your life that you can directly point to as instrumental to your career and Heather is one of mine. My advancement from Recruiting Coordinator to Recruiter would not have happened when it did without her guidance. Her mentorship continues to guide me in my career and I doubt I will ever be able to truly thank her for her endless support and friendship.

I’ll count myself lucky if we get the chance to work together in the future.

It’s rare to find someone as passionate about her work as Sarah. The level of energy and dedication to the team that she would bring to the office every day was remarkable. 

There are few individual people in your life that you can directly point to as instrumental to your career and Sarah is one of mine. I started at New Relic as a temp, with Sarah as my leader. I instantly wanted to prove myself to her from day one. She gave me every opportunity to succeed but also treated me fairly and held me to high standards. We built a relationship based on fearless feedback and open communication and I take these two values into all of my relationships, both personal and professional. My career would not be where it is without her guidance.

I looked forward to every day at New Relic in large part to Sarah, I always enjoyed sharing a laugh or jumping into the 'trench' with her. I’ll count myself lucky if we get the chance to work together in the future.
